metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15238 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
ReadOneJNGImage in coders/png.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has ause-after-free issue when the height or width is zero, related toReadJNGImage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15238` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.26-14
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.26-14
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.26-14
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.26-14
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.26-14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.26-14').
